events.message: I ordered a package two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't been updated for several days and I'm very worried about the delay.
System has categorized the issue under Delivery Delay based on customer mentioning late shipment and tracking problems.
Customer case assigned to agent Mark Johnson for handling the delayed delivery inquiry.
Hello, this is Mark from customer support. I see your order has been delayed, and Iâ€™m here to help you with this issue.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the latest status from our courier partner?
Thanks for the quick response. My order number is 789456123 and the shipping address is 123 Elm Street, Springfield.
After checking with the courier, it seems there was an unexpected delay in transit. We will expedite the shipment and provide a tracking update within 24 hours.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you looking into it quickly and helping to speed up the delivery.
Your shipment has now been prioritized and the courier has updated tracking. The package should arrive within the next 2 days.
We are following up to ensure you have received your order and everything is in good condition. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the delivery has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
